message: I want to order 2 pepperoni pizzas and 3 chicken alfredo pizzas

Great! I found Pepperoni Pizzas and Chicken Alfredo Pizzas on our menu.

Would you like to place an order for these items? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel. If you would like to proceed, could you please provide your NYU ID, building number, phone number, and any special requests for your order?
